update MDST.SOITEM
SOI_ORDREF = #{record.soiOrdref,jdbcType=CHAR},
SOI_SEQ = #{record.soiSeq,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SOI_LINSEQ = #{record.soiLinseq,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SOI_ITTYPE = #{record.soiIttype,jdbcType=CHAR},
SOI_ITSTK = #{record.soiItstk,jdbcType=CHAR},
SOI_PRODUCT = #{record.soiProduct,jdbcType=CHAR},
SOI_DESC = #{record.soiDesc,jdbcType=CHAR},
SOI_ITQTY = #{record.soiItqty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SOI_PRICE = #{record.soiPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SOI_PER = #{record.soiPer,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SOI_UOM = #{record.soiUom,jdbcType=CHAR},
SOI_CONVERT = #{record.soiConvert,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SOI_ITSTAT = #{record.soiItstat,jdbcType=CHAR},
SOI_NDELDAT = #{record.soiNdeldat,jdbcType=DATE},
SOI_WEIGHT = #{record.soiWeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

SOI_COSSAL = #{record.soiCossal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SOI_BULKREF = #{record.soiBulkref,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SOI_DISCPER = #{record.soiDiscper,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SOI_SUFFIX = #{record.soiSuffix,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
